# Overview

The package `survSAKK` provides publicaiton ready Kaplan-Meier Plots developed at the SAKK CC.https://www.sakk.ch/en. 

## Get started

### Install the package

```{r}
devtools::install_github(
  repo = "https://github.com/SAKK-Statistics/survSAKK",
  build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

### Load package
```{r}
libray(survSAKK)
```

### Get the documentation of a function 

```{r}
?survSAKK
```

### Acess vignette
```{r}
vignette(survSAKK)
```
